items.title: New Trump envoy says he will serve to make Greenland part of US
items.description: Denmark warns Washington to respect its sovereignty, while Greenland says it will decide its own future.

items.title: Élysée Palace staff member to stand trial over theft of precious tableware
items.description: Thomas M is accused of stealing solider silver and porcelain used for state banquets from France's presidential palace.

items.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
items.description: Lt Gen Fanil Sarvarov is the third military official to have been killed in bomb attacks in the Russian capital over the last year.

items.title: Gold and silver hit records as investors hunt for safety
items.description: Investors are flocking to precious metals amid geopolitical tensions and expectations of more US interest rate cuts.

items.title: US pursuing third oil tanker linked to Venezuela, official says
items.description: The move comes days after President Donald Trump said that he was ordering a blockade of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.
